data.name: This Time - VIP Early Bird Access
data.detailed_description:
This DLC pack will grant you access to EVERY SINGLE new version of This Time, 2 weeks before public release!

Not only that, but you will gain access to EVERY SINGLE 'Exclusive render DLC pack' (coming soon) the day it releases completely free of charge.

For all players who want to show extra support to the development of the game by purchasing this DLC, you will be given exclusive access to every single new content release 2 weeks before the general public.

Note:
Bugfix releases will be pushed out to general release as soon as they are available, this DLC entitles you to early access to NEW CONTENT releases only.

data.short_description: This DLC pack will grant you access to EVERY SINGLE new version of This Time, 2 weeks before public release as well as access to all 'Exclusive Render DLC packs' (coming soon) completely free.

  • Sound Card: Any

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains very graphic sexual scenes including close up fully exposed male and female genitals.
There are also some optional scenes which include prostitution and some non-consensual sex and sexual assault.
Some optional scenes contain non-consensual voyeurism such as peeking in changing rooms without permission.

The game also contains themes of suicide, drug use and alcohol use.
